text:
October 4, 1957
Dr, Burton Paulu
K U 0 M
1 Eddy Hall
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
Dear Burtons
If an Institute is held, then I think NAEB should
have at least an MAEB luncheon, and at least a half
day for radlo/televislon utilization project. Personally,
I still doubt the value of the Institute, I feel it
now, and Iâ€™ve felt that way for many years.
Sineerely
Frank E, Schooley
